entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Salluit

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
